results.title: X-Men (2004) #166
results.description: "GOLGOTHA" Part 1 (of 5) The X-Men travel to Antarctica to respond to an S.O.S. from a colony of mutants…and what they find is far more shocking than they expected! Will the X-Men share the colony’s gruesome fate?

textObjects.text:
"GOLGOTHA" Part 1 (of 5)
A great big Marvel welcome to new writer Peter Milligan! The X-Men travel to Antarctica to respond to an S.O.S. from a colony of mutants…and what they find is far more shocking than they expected! Will the X-Men share the colony’s gruesome fate?

results.description: "BIZARRE LOVE TRIANGLE" Part 1 (of 4). A new student has arrived at the Xavier Institute. She’s sexy, sassy, and has the hots for Gambit! Will Gambit be seduced by this little Lolita, or will Rogue do the unthinkable to keep her man?!

results.title: X-Men (2004) #174
results.description: "BIZARRE LOVE TRIANGLE" Part 4 (of 4) A figure from the X-Men’s past has returned to the mansion seeking sanctuary within the walls of Xavier’s home. The guest, however, isn’t getting the warmest welcome. Could the X-Men really turn away this desperate mutant and will they be able to forgive themselves if they do?

results.title: X-Men (2004) #175
results.description:
WILD KINGDOM Part 1
The X-Men travel deep to the heart of Africa to investigate reports of strange, mutated animals roaming wild near Wakanda. But what happens when their discoveries lead them to the King of Wakanda himself—the Black Panther?!

textObjects.text:
Parts 1 of a 4-part crossover with BLACK PANTHER!

The X-Men travel deep to the heart of Africa to investigate reports of strange, mutated animals roaming wild near Wakanda. But what happens when their discoveries lead them to the King of Wakanda himself—T’Challa, the Black Panther?!
This issue leads into BLACK PANTHER #8!

32 PGS. /T+ SUGGESTES FOR TEENS AND UP …$2.50

WILD KINGDOM Part 1

results.title: X-Men (2004) #176
results.description:
WILD KINGDOM Part 3
The X-Men’s team-up with Black Panther continues! With the X-Men captured, Storm and Black Panther are going to have to put their differences aside and work together before all of Africa is overrun with mutated monstrosities!
